game.name: Toxic Toads
game.desc: Description: You are a toxic toad trying to make all the other toads toxic. Arrange the toads and then set off a chain reaction of toxicity! Controls: * Arrow Keys - Navigate the grid of regular toads / move the toxic toad around the outside * X / Z - When a regular toad is selected, rotates clockwise / counter-clockwise * X - When the toxic toad is selected, infects the toad it is facing
